nodes.bodyText: This probably will need to wrap around the ThemeProvider stuff so that in the future we can reference the CustomizationProvider inside of src/theme/GraylogThemeProvider.jsx and get any modified color values.

Should we do it now or later?
What do you suggest exactly should I do?
I do have some suggestions, but may require some back-and-forth to make sure all our needs are accounted for. Let's plan a time to pair up for 30 minutes and discuss this!
Not sure if these changes are relevant to the Customization Plugin system?
These changes are needed in the enterprise PR, I could do them in an extra PR, but I thought it does not harm here.
Not sure if these changes are relevant to the Customization Plugin system?
Not for the plugin system but for the header badge which is part of the customization page.
Should the {} be something more specific?

Since the customization will be pluggable I do not know what will be in that store state.
So I could add something like:
[string]: mixed
but I do not think we will gain much with that.

I agree that we will not gain much, but perhaps we should still use [string]: mixed for consistency as it seems we use that more often?
I will defer to your judgement here though as my Flow experience is minimal.
I think this should indicate that it's not a generic header badge, but the DevelopmentHeaderBadge or something similar.
